name: Fortetsi
description: The main goal is to destroy the opponent's fortress and don't let them destroy your own. Create unit cards, place them on one of three lines, and watch them capture outposts and fight enemy units! However, due to the lack of direct control over the units, one must carefully plan one's actions in advance so as not to leave any of the lines defenseless against the enemy army. The game is designed for short matches of 3 - 5 minutes.
